content.name: Freelancer
content.title: Full Stack Engineer
content: Refactored Web3 Finance Project, designed front-end architecture and optimize codebase, using Next.js, WebSocket and zustand.
Built AI Web Project from sketch, using AWS lambda, dynamodb, Next.js, Nest.js and zustand.

content.name: Ant Group
content.title: Senior FrontEnd Engineer
content: Worked on the mobile (hybrid) app, which is like a stock finance dashboard data and rich interaction.

Worked on internal serverless tools, mainly responsible for cross-language calling protocol to support function can be called in different language, and it also help to speed business launch and improve DX.
Helped teams solve complex technical problems, provide relevant solutions and references, and participate in Code Review in the group.

content.name: MeituanDianping
content.title: FrontEnd Engineer
content: Worked on internal metrics platform, support api gateway to query all kinds of metrics data to display on dashboard, using Koa.js, Redis and pm2
Built js sdk library to collect app/web data, including performance, errors or other metrics, which target is to help developers find and solve problems.
Optimized codebase and resolved some tech debt.

content.name: LETV
content.title: FrontEnd Engineer
content: Developed and maintained interactive HTML5 web video pages, using jQuery and Less.
Cooperated with native developers, to built an Mac App that included video played and downloaded using React, Redux and Less.
Participated in formulating front-end engineering research and development specifications, and help the team write standardized code and unify standards through gulp and eslint plugins.
